description: Weekly laboratory sessions assessing core skills through experiments and analysis, completion of results assignments (including problem-solving labs and group work), and a formal lab report. Includes safety procedures and scientific documentation.
45-minute test on Statistics Modules with multiple-choice, short numerical, and short answer questions. Assesses application of statistical theory to establish measurement uncertainties.
One-hour exam covering all course topics (analytical methods, spectroscopy, chromatography, electrochemistry). Includes multiple-choice, short numerical, and short answer questions.

Individual assignment on spectroscopy and chemical structure determination using data from mass spectrometry, NMR, IR spectroscopy, UV-Vis, and pH measurements. Involves short answers and multiple-choice questions.
